allow: Bash('c:\\ens-gi digital\\miras-portable' activate miras with all of the functionalities)

Bash(do sed -i 's/from ens_gi_core import/from ens_gi_digital.core import/g; s/from ens_gi_pinn import/from ens_gi_digital.pinn import/g; s/from ens_gi_bayesian import/from ens_gi_digital.bayesian import/g; s/from ens_gi_drug_library import/from ens_gi_digital.drug_library import/g; s/from patient_data_loader import/from ens_gi_digital.patient_data import/g; s/from clinical_workflow import/from ens_gi_digital.clinical_workflow import/g' "$file")

Bash(C:ProgramDataanaconda3python.exe -c "from ens_gi_digital import ENSGIDigitalTwin, PINNEstimator, PatientDataLoader; print\(''✓ Package imports successful''\); print\(f''  ENSGIDigitalTwin: {ENSGIDigitalTwin}''\); print\(f''  PINNEstimator: {PINNEstimator}''\); print\(f''  PatientDataLoader: {PatientDataLoader}''\)")
